name: k6-api-testing-framework
description: A comprehensive, dockerized K6 framework for functional and load testing of REST APIs.

scripts.docker:build: npm run generate:payloads && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml build
scripts.test: npm run generate:payloads && dotenv -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml run --rm -e SCRIPT_NAME -e Env k6 run --no-progress
scripts.load: npm run generate:payloads && dotenv -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml run --rm -e SCRIPT_NAME -e Env -e VUS -e DURATION -e LOAD_PROFILE k6 run --no-progress
